parameters.name: version_date
parameters.description: Release date of the API version in YYYY-MM-DD format.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The text of the entity value.

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: Any metadata related to the entity value.

parameters.name: synonyms
parameters.description: An array of synonyms for the entity value.

parameters.name: patterns
parameters.description: An array of patterns for the entity value. A pattern is specified as a regular expression.

parameters.name: value_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of value (`synonyms` or `patterns`). The default value is `synonyms`.
